biotools.summary:
A tool for the detection of bistability and multi-steady state behaviour in signaling and gene regulatory networks.

https://sites.google.com/view/bioswitch.

BioSwitch is a Matlab software tool for detection of multi-steady state behaviour in biochemical reaction networks (specially suited for signaling and gene regulatory networks)
